com.invoices.service

Class VatService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.invoices.service.VatService

  • public class VatService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is annotated as a service. It is the service bean for the Vat entity
    Author:
    psoutzis

    • Constructor Detail

      • VatService

        public VatService()

    • Method Detail

      • getRecordAndSaveIfNotExists

        public Vat getRecordAndSaveIfNotExists(java.lang.Float rate)
        This method is used when updating or creating an invoice. It checks if a record with the vat rate passed as an argument exists in the database and returns it. If it doesn't it inserts a new record for that rate.
        Parameters:
        rate - The value of the rate to get from db (or insert as a new record for it, if it doesn't exist).
        Returns:
        The Vat record containing the rate requested.

      • determineVatRate

        public boolean determineVatRate(java.lang.String isApplicable,
                                java.lang.String isExempt,
                                java.lang.String chargeReversed)
        Parameters:
        isApplicable - If VAT is applicable to the invoice ('YES' equals true).
        isExempt - If Invoice is eligible for VAT exemption ('YES' equals true).
        chargeReversed - If VAT of the invoice can be reversibly charged ('YES' equals true).
        Returns:
        False if isExempt or chargeReversed are equal to 'YES'. Also return False if isApplicable is equal to 'NO'.

      • isVatApplicable

        private boolean isVatApplicable(IsApplicable isApplicable)
        Parameters:
        isApplicable - Is equal to either "YES" or "NO".
        Returns:
        True if argument is equal to YES, otherwise return False.

      • save

        private Vat save(Vat vat)
        Method will insert the parsed Vat object to the database
        Parameters:
        vat - the Vat object to insert to database as a record
        Returns:
        the Vat object that was just inserted to db (and now has an autogenerated ID)

      • getVatRecords

        public java.util.List<Vat> getVatRecords()
        Returns:
        all the Vat records from the database

      • getRecord

        private Vat getRecord(java.lang.Long id)
        Parameters:
        id - the id of vat record to fetch
        Returns:
        a Vat record with a unique id, identical to the one passed as an argument

      • getRecordWithRateOfZero

        public Vat getRecordWithRateOfZero()
        Returns:
        the record from the database that has a rate of 0.0%

      • getRecordWithRateOf

        private Vat getRecordWithRateOf(java.lang.Float rate)
        Parameters:
        rate - The rate of the record to fetch (attribute: "vat_rate").
        Returns:
        The record with the vat rate equal to the argument, only if it exists in the database.
